Articles.Content:
I'm making an electric engine now, look this thread:

[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/112759-Electric-motors-and-propellers/page4](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/112759-Electric-motors-and-propellers/page4)

And I'm wondering how to make the engine propeler rotate depending of the engine speed, you got ideas ?

I have the animation on unity, but I don't know how to make it speed variable :/
I believe this belongs in add-on development (and so moved), but could you clarify your question and the thread title, please?

> 
> I'm making an electric engine now, look this thread:
> [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/112759-Electric-motors-and-propellers/page4](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/112759-Electric-motors-and-propellers/page4)
> 
> And I'm wondering how to make the engine propeler rotate depending of the engine speed, you got ideas ?
> 
> I have the animation on unity, but I don't know how to make it speed variable :/

I don't think stock KSP has anything for this, but Firespitter might. Have a look through its documentation.
